title: What are the concepts about the importance of philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: Philosophy is the science that studies and explains the underlying nature of reality and of the relationships of the other sciences to each other and reality. All of the sciences are important for those who are interested in the aspects of reality that can be learned. Or, to put it the way my philosophy professor, Calvin Seerveld, taught, “Philosophy is the janitor of the sciences.”
